recipes.name: Tal’s Tahini “bread pudding”
recipes.description: A delicious baked dessert that takes 5 minutes to make!

step.description: Beat all ingredients together really well in a blender.
Pour mixture in an oiled cake tray (we suggest sesame oil for the oiling) and sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Bake for 25-30 minutes at 345F (convection bake is better). Depending on your oven, you may want to turn it around (horizontally) after 15 minutes to ensure even baking.
Done, enjoy! We actually eat it with a spoon straight from the cake tray!

recipes.notes:
- If you are not avoiding carbs, you can substitute the maple extract with maple syrup.
- Other ingredients we've tried (not all at once!): cardamom, Grand Marnier, vanilla extract. Feel free to experiment!
